title: The Anadromist News Update April 25 2021 (Rookmaaker, Paul VanderKlay, Faturechi, Puppetry)
description:
Links Below for recent videos:
Interview on Jacob Faturechi's channel: https://youtu.be/ZbdhwbAu39M

ROOKMAAKER'S COMPLETE WORKS ARE BACK IN PRINT. 
The text of his lectures can be found in The Complete Works of Hans Rookmaaker, edited by his daughter Marleen Hengelaar-Rookmaaker. 
THIS HAS JUST BEEN REPRINTED IN INDIVIDUAL VOLUMES. (Roughly $35 each or £25.) BUY THEM NOW THEY WILL NOT LAST.
Here is a Link to the US Amazon:
https://www.amazon.com/s?k=hans+Rookmaaker+complete+works&i=stripbooks&ref=nb_sb_noss

And here is one to the UK Amazon: 
https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?i=stripbooks&k=hans%20Rookmaaker%20complete%20works&ref=glow_cls&refresh=1

And more of Rookmaaker's L'Abri lectures can be found at the L'Abri Ideas Library.  https://www.labriideaslibrary.org
......
Here is the first of the Sukhishvili videos: https://youtu.be/s8EaOP-QtQ8

Here is my Georgian Crossroads video hike through the Tbilisi mountains:
https://youtu.be/lIAFos4tKOI
.....
Since I can't get monetized I need your help. PLEASE SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL, Do consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me afloat here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 10 hours worth of extra content immediately. ($10 per month or more  OR $50 plus in one gift.)
Click this...    https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC

Watch this video for more about receiving extra content: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne

#rookmaaker #folkdances #paulvanderklay
